about.description:
nbautoexport automatically exports Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more)
upon save. One great use case is to automatically have script versions of your notebooks to
facilitate code review commenting.
about.summary: Automatically export Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more) on save.

about.description:
nbautoexport automatically exports Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more)
upon save. One great use case is to automatically have script versions of your notebooks to
facilitate code review commenting.
about.summary: Automatically export Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more) on save.

name: nbautoexport
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "nbautoexport" %}
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05fd7f8489be712bdd575f35a7e0be99add8d54eeea6d3028aa437940f27ad74

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - nbautoexport=nbautoexport.nbautoexport:app

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.7
  run:
    - nbconvert >=5.6.1
    - nbformat
    - notebook
    - jupyter_core
    - packaging
    - pydantic
    - python >=3.7
    - traitlets
    - typer >=0.3.0

test:
  imports:
    - nbautoexport
  commands:
    - pip check
    - nbautoexport --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/drivendataorg/nbautoexport
  summary: Automatically export Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more) on save.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    nbautoexport automatically exports Jupyter notebooks to various file formats (.py, .html, and more)
    upon save. One great use case is to automatically have script versions of your notebooks to
    facilitate code review commenting.
  doc_url: https://nbautoexport.drivendata.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/drivendataorg/nbautoexport

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jayqi
